item.title: The Beautiful Commute: Visualizing one full year of bike commuting in Cincinnati
item.description: TL;DR - I mapped out an entire year of biking to and from work here in Cincinnati. Introduction 2017 was an interesting year in terms of my daily commute.

item.title: Biking from Cleveland to Montr√©al
item.description: window.jQuery || document.write('') Earlier this summer after quitting my job I had a two week window before a mandatory bachelor party in Vegas which I was determined to fill with something good.

item.title: Cincy to Dayton and Back by Bike / My First Century!
item.description: Since I had some time off recently, I decided to finally try and bike to Dayton and back in one day.
